title: Add Dark Mode
description: Users want a dark mode feature for better accessibility at night.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Improve app loading speed and responsiveness.

title: Multi-language Support
description: Add support for Spanish, French, and Bengali languages.

title: User Profile Editing
description: Allow users to edit their name, photo, and bio.

title: Admin Dashboard
description: Create an admin panel for managing user content.

title: Bug Reporting System
description: Enable users to report bugs directly from the app.

title: Public Roadmap Page
description: Let users view the roadmap without logging in.

title: Live Chat Support
description: Add real-time chat for customer support.
